description: Try our easy to follow Christmas Stuffing Balls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Meatballs,Low saturated fat,High protein,Seafood free,Christmas,Stuffing,Mince,Low sugar,Chicken
name: Christmas Stuffing Balls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Soak dried cranberries in boiling water for 15 minutes.

Meanwhile, heat oil in a frying pan and cook onions until soft and golden. Transfer to a large bowl and add mince, stuffing mix, parsley and eggs. Drain cranberries, add to bowl and mix together well. With damp hands roll into golf ball sized balls.
Add to baking pan, spray with oil spray and cook for 30 minutes until golden.
